channel.title: Dragon Greatsword
channel.description:
Well here I am with my creativity again...Heres you go... [URL=http://img684.imageshack.us/i/dragongreatsword.png/][IMG]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/5594/dragongreatsword.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img836.imageshack.us/i/dragongreatsword2.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/3497/dragongreatsword2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img837.imageshack.us/i/dragogreatswordwf.png/][IMG]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/909/dragogreatswordwf.png[/img][/URL]
I split the pieces of the sword for a better wireframe.
Critique please!

item.title: Dragon Greatsword
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“brandonscarinfo, post:51, topic:361362”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=457640.msg3454582#msg3454582 date=1293958352]

dude WTF is with all u bitches minus repping me? is it hate the new guy day or something?
seriously…its said…and as for [quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=457640.msg3454471#msg3454471 date=1293951915]

h1 you fuck off… seriously grow up. I really didnt realize I was gravedigging, I got sorta lost while just looking at the models thread and kept going and didnt realize that i was about 100 pages in, SO I AM SORRY FOR THE GRAVEDIGGING.
no need to flame me for saying it looks like a korasi, because in all honesty it does. no offense to OP but I think it could use a little modificiation to the hilt, otherwise good post. and to jerks like H1, you can just smd because I dont care what you say or call me.

btw…fffffffffffffffffffuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu
bitch dont u --Rep me cybernerd
:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

Please don’t attempt to blow up the bomb known as h1 sk1ller.

Mods, please lock this.

well F him. that bitch minus repped me 3 times now.

Hit enter quite a lot there. And rep is pointless. You shouldn’t care if someone rep’s you in any way. It’s just a number on the internet.

cole…seriously bro…i want rep not so i feel good about myself, but so i can rep others who do great work and dont get any credit for it. jeez. sad ass nerds sitting at home with no life just minus repping people because they are jealous.
[/quote]
Jealous of what? A child who rages on moparscape all the time? You need to learn to control yourself. Obviously, a lot of people aren’t thinking highly of you right now. Calm down. And what will repping others do? Give them more meaningless numbers? I don’t get why this thread hasn’t been locked yet.
[/quote]

lol. ur kinda funny. i bet you that you are a 13 y.o. immature kid that tries to act all big and mighty on the net. i bet irl u and h1 are nothing but fa tnerds that get winded walking from their computer to their bathroom. so stfu. and ifk y this hasnt been locked. maybe the mods are enjoying this and having a laugh or two… seriously tho. people arent thinking highly of me because of the fag that start the – repping. so if u think im to blame then u better sit down and rethink what you said. smart ass…[/quote]

Read full topic
